messages.content: What are the main features of the comfyui_fk_server plugin?

The plugin includes three main features: translation support for long text input boxes in ComfyUI, a prompt word refinement feature to help users generate professional AI painting prompts using the Zhispec AI model, and a model reference correction function to fix model folder path discrepancies between different workflows for efficient model argument correction.
How do I enable the automatic translation mode in comfyui_fk_server?
To enable the automatic translation mode, you need to double-click any long text input box in ComfyUI after the plugin is installed and restarted.
How can I use the prompt word refinement feature in comfyui_fk_server?
The prompt word refinement feature can be accessed by first entering auto-translation mode and then using the prompt word refinement function.
Can the model reference correction function help with all types of model folder path discrepancies?
Model reference correction works by matching the model name and supports fixing most common model folder path discrepancies.
What is the translation feature powered by?
The translation feature is powered by the Fanyi API of Baidu.
What is the prompt word refinement function designed for?
The prompt word refinement function is designed to help users write professional AI painting prompts.
How can I get free access to the Zhispec AI model?
You can get free access to the Zhispec AI model through https://open.bigmodel.cn/overview and many free API keys are provided there.
What is the Fanyi API of Baidu credited for?
The Fanyi API of Baidu provides translation capabilities for free applications, with a monthly free quota of 100,000 calls, which is sufficient for most needs.
How can I access the model reference correction feature?
You need to double-click any long text input box in ComfyUI and enter the auto-translation mode to access the model reference correction feature.
Can comfyui_fk_server support multiple languages besides Chinese?
The translation feature supports translation into multiple languages, but the specific languages are not specified in the document.
What are the file's characteristics of the comfyui_fk_server plugin?
The comfyui_fk_server plugin is a source code file that contains the implementation details of the features mentioned above.
How does the model reference correction function assist users?
The model reference correction function helps users by quickly correcting model folders that do not match, which improves the efficiency of model selection and usage.
Is there a minimum size requirement for the text input to be eligible for translation?
The document does not mention any specific minimum size requirement, so it can be assumed that the translation feature works on any size of text input.
